uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.email

Class SignMailVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.email.SignMailVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Contexed

    public class SignMailVisitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Contexed
    A class that modifies email messages before they are sent. The default behaviour leaves the message un-modified but this class can be extended to implement mail signing.
